info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Schenectady, western Albany, northwestern Greene, Schoharie and Montgomery Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1244 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fort Plain to near Richmondville to near Delhi. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amsterdam, Cobleskill, Canajoharie, Fonda, Jefferson, Duanesburg, Berne, Fort Plain, Windham, Middleburgh, Gilboa, Summit, Schoharie, Richmondville, Prattsville, Sharon Springs, Fort Johnson, Delanson, Ames and Breakabeen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 24. Interstate 90 between exits 27 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
